mcq.statement: The Mistress said, “Fanny, did you mail the two letters I gave you yesterday?”

options.a: The mistress enquired of Fanny if she had mailed the two letters she gave her the day before.
options.b: The mistress enquired of Fanny whether she had mailed the two letters she had given her yesterday.
options.c: The mistress asked Fanny if she had mailed the two letters she had given her the day before.
